    • execute

      default void execute(ProcessPluginApi api, Variables variables, SendTaskValues sendTaskValues) throws Exception
      Default implementation uses a TaskSender from getTaskSender(ProcessPluginApi, Variables, SendTaskValues) to send Task resources with the BusinessKeyStrategy from getBusinessKeyStrategy().
